author: kfogel
msg: Mention where to report Apache bugs.

author: dws
msg: * packages/rpm/subversion.spec : Back to using apr and apr-util separately
from apache.

author: dws
msg: * packages/rpm/subversion.spec : Updated apache and APR/APR-UTIL requirements.
Took out (now non-existant) documentation file from SPEC file.

author: gstein
msg: Patch concept and initial code from Daniel Berlin <dan@dberlin.org>
(with big changes from Greg)
Add code to cvs2svn to actually create a target SVN repository.
- add RevInfoParser class for extracting author/log from a ,v file
- add Commit.get_metadata() for fetching each commit's metadata
- flesh out Commit.commit() to actually write a commit into the SVN
target repository.
- add repository creation into pass4()
- ensure that we flush pending commits in pass4()
- use new svn.util.run_app() function to make us an APR app and give
us a pool with proper cleanup.

author: gstein
msg: * subversion/bindings/swig/svn_string.i (typemap svn_string_t):
Making the property value a default parameter also made the pool a
default parameter. That's very bad, since we need the pool. Instead,
we just want to treat None as the NULL/delete-it value.
